mapper.update: UPDATE "BOARD" SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "BOARD_IMG" (IMG_NO, BOARD_NO, IMG_RENAME, IMG_ORDER) VALUES (BOARD_IMG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_SUBJECT, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_SUBJECT = #{boardSubject} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET (#{cp} - 1) * 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_SUBJECT, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_UPDATE_DATE FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_SUBJECT = #{boardSubject} <choose> <when test="key == 't'"> AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' </when> <when test="key == 'c'"> AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' </when> <when test="key == 'tc'"> AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%') </when> <otherwise> AND MEMBER_NO IN ( SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) </otherwise> </choose> ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET (#{cp} - 1) * 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
